declarations.description: A web component comprising a list of validation rules for a field. As users type, each rule is checked against a regular expression pattern and displays a checkmark (✓) or X (✗) to indicate whether the requirement is met.
declarations.name: FormValidationListElement

slots.description: Default slot for list items with data-pattern attributes

return.description: Whether all rules are currently matched

events.name: form-validation-list:validated
events.description: Fired when validation completes with details about matched/total rules

type.text: { isValid: boolean, matchedRules: number, totalRules: number, field: HTMLElement }

attributes.name: for
attributes.description: The ID of the input field to validate

attributes.name: trigger-event
attributes.description: The event to trigger validation on (default: "input")

attributes.name: each-delay
attributes.description: Delay in milliseconds between each rule being classified (default: 150)

attributes.name: field-invalid-class
attributes.description: The class to apply when the field is invalid (default: "validation-invalid")

attributes.name: field-valid-class
attributes.description: The class to apply when the field is valid (default: "validation-valid")

attributes.name: rule-unmatched-class
attributes.description: The class to apply when the rule's requirement are not met (default: "validation-unmatched")

attributes.name: rule-matched-class
attributes.description: The class to apply when the rule's requirement are met (default: "validation-matched")

attributes.name: validation-message
attributes.description: Custom validation message template with {matched} and {total} placeholders for internationalization (default: "Please match all validation requirements ({matched} of {total})")

cssProperties.name: --validation-icon-matched
cssProperties.description: Content for the matched state icon

cssProperties.name: --validation-icon-unmatched
cssProperties.description: Content for the unmatched state icon
